FILE: cm205230v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRELAND-SPAIN
RIVALRY: RIV486
DATES: 19841020-19851128
DISPUTE(S): MID2542 MID2543 

PS: 19860101-19920206 0.75 19920207-20209999 1.00

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: EU dyad 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220221
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220221


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2542 

TERRMID: MID2542 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2542 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2542 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2542 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2542 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2542 3 -- uncertain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2542 from Gibler, Miller, and Little (2016), Irish fishing boats fired on a Spanish fishing boat in Irish waters. Coded not maritime because no maritime boundary was disputed, and coded uncertain since GLM recommend the case be dropped due to no protest from Spain. 

ISLMID: MID2542 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2542 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2542 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2542 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2542 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2542 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2542 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2542 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2542 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2542 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 



MID2543 

TERRMID: MID2543 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2543 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2543 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2543 from Gibler (2018), Irish fishing boats fired on a Spanish fishing boat in Irish waters. In a separate incident, the Irish navy fired on a Spanish vessel. Coded not maritime because no maritime boundary was disputed. 

ISLMID: MID2543 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2543 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2543 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2543 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2543 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2543 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 




RIVNOTES:

MARITIME-DISPUTE:

Discussion:
SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield. 

Gibler, D.M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
